name: Manav Pragati Sansthan
briefDescription: Manav Pragati Sansthan (MPS) the society for human development was founded and registered under the Rajasthan Societies Registration Act 1958 as a NGO on July 31, 1996. The organization has special consultative status with the United Nation  Economic and Social council (ECOSOC). It has also registered under FCRA to receive foreign funds. The organization has empanelled with the Tata Institute of Social Science ( TISS) Mumbai . The number of staff personnel are 22 in the organisation .
